document.full_text: type 2 diabetes is eight and a half times more common among children in the united states treated with growth hormone than among kids who are not on the hormone treatment, a new study shows.
document.title: growth hormone treatment tied to diabetes in kids
lines_and_colors: type 2 diabetes is eight and a half times more common among children in the united states treated with growth hormone than among kids who are not on the hormone treatment, a new study shows.
